forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. West wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 42. West northwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind 8 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Clear then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 2am. Mostly clear, with a low around 45. South southwest wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Cloudy. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Isolated Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy

Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
